operationsresearch wrote:

> The following method could be useful..
> public static void fail(Exception e)
> Fails a test with a message containing stack trace of given exception.

public void testMyTest() throws Exception {
     myObject.methodThrowsException();
}

You already get a test failure (actually an "error") with a stack trace.
